name: Inhuman Resources
description:
You are an intern at the totally no evil company, Inhuman Resources. One day you are invited to the basement for a special project. The next thing you know, your a ghost, and you can possess living creatures. Can you solve your murder? What will you do when you find out who did it?

ControlBindingPrepare to Move (Spectre)E (Held)Aim Movement (Spectre)MouseShoot (Spectre)E (Release)Move Possessed LifeformWASDRead Note/Use LiftQ Team MemberRoleDiscordJonathan CarterProgrammerJ,#4800Meriel GreenArtist (Characters, Props, Enviroment assets)Vit#6003Stuart HoneymanMusic & SFXStu#9458CarsonProgrammeraztec_man#3032James StormerArtist (Background & Main Building)James Stormer#1712

Source code on Github: https://github.com/JonathanMCarter/GJLSpring2021


Note from dev team: yea we overscoped on this project so the final result is a little rushed, game jams hey.... Though our main focus was the story xD. We hope you enjoy our little game and all had a great time working on your own games for this jam. We look foward to seeing your games as well. Good luck all.

Why so early? yea.... life happens and the main programmer (jonathan, me writing this) got a job during the jam week so needed a break before starting on Tomorrow (March 1st), so that's why we are so early, though our game build may update nearer the deadline. with fixes and improvements.
